dependencies: Werkzeug==3.0.2, Jinja2==3.1.3, itsdangerous==2.2.0, blinker==1.8.0 (requirements.txt; Flask transitive/related)
architectural_resources: Containerized web application (Flask inference-style API exposing /ping and /invocations) (app.py, Dockerfile)
AWS SageMaker Endpoint (invoked via boto3 sagemaker-runtime) (post_test.py, README.md)
AWS ECR container registry (implied by docker tag/push commands in README.md)
IAM role/permissions for SageMaker/Lambda invocation (implied by README.md errors and boto3 usage)
CloudWatch Logs / monitoring for SageMaker endpoint health checks (implied by README.md)

dependencies: boto3 (used in lambda/src/lambda_function.py; version pinned in repo root requirements.txt: boto3==1.34.93)
architectural_resources: AWS SageMaker Endpoint (hello-world-endpoint) invoked from Lambda via sagemaker-runtime (lambda/src/lambda_function.py)
EventBridge/CloudWatch scheduled trigger (suggested in repo README.md as an architecture option)
IAM role/permissions for Lambda to invoke SageMaker endpoint (implied by boto3 usage)
